about_the_game:
Escape prison with your robot arm in Little Trouble on Tribuda island. Play as Little Lincoln as you Shoot down waves of inmates, guards and deadly Hyogens while trying to escape Zarcal prison.

Gain New upgrades that will boost your guns capabilities and unlock new hidden bonus abilities that even Little Lincoln himself doesn't know.

Can you Escape prison with just your wits, reflexes and an upgradeable robot arm that fires Bullets!
exploding bullets, freezing bullets, ricochet bullets...

Key Features:


Endless Wave Mode - of endless enemies endlessly trying to end your life. how long can you survive.

Prison Escape Roguelite - Escape zarcal prison but beware, heinous inmates and monsters are in your way.

Unique Weapon Upgrades - your bullets are weak, well then make them stronger, you want to pierce through enemies go ahead, you want to shoot multiple bullets, suit yourself, you want to Delete everybody off the face of the earth, thats a bit much just take an explode upgrade and relax.



Buyable items - you like buying stuff, stuff that makes you cooler, stuff that makes you stronger, well its here.

Unique Enemies - these enemies come in all sorts of colors baby!, of course they would they are Hyogens.

weapon upgrade Set Bonuses - Inside your robot arm are hidden little chips that are only activated once the required upgrades are equipped, its up to you to figure out their recipes but lemme tell you that once you do... stuff happens.



progression system - hey you died, no big deal, just use your experience to upgrade your upgrades so that they can upgrade your robot arm more.

Achievements - reach those achievements baby, there are goals out there, and it's up to you to achieve the achievable and gain the achievements.

Escape prison with your robot arm in Little Trouble on Tribuda island. Play as Little Lincoln as you Shoot down waves of inmates, guards and deadly Hyogens while trying to escape Zarcal prison.

Gain New upgrades that will boost your guns capabilities and unlock new hidden bonus abilities that even Little Lincoln himself doesn't know.

Can you Escape prison with just your wits, reflexes and an upgradeable robot arm that fires Bullets!
exploding bullets, freezing bullets, ricochet bullets...

Key Features:


Endless Wave Mode - of endless enemies endlessly trying to end your life. how long can you survive.

Prison Escape Roguelite - Escape zarcal prison but beware, heinous inmates and monsters are in your way.

Unique Weapon Upgrades - your bullets are weak, well then make them stronger, you want to pierce through enemies go ahead, you want to shoot multiple bullets, suit yourself, you want to Delete everybody off the face of the earth, thats a bit much just take an explode upgrade and relax.



Buyable items - you like buying stuff, stuff that makes you cooler, stuff that makes you stronger, well its here.

Unique Enemies - these enemies come in all sorts of colors baby!, of course they would they are Hyogens.

weapon upgrade Set Bonuses - Inside your robot arm are hidden little chips that are only activated once the required upgrades are equipped, its up to you to figure out their recipes but lemme tell you that once you do... stuff happens.



progression system - hey you died, no big deal, just use your experience to upgrade your upgrades so that they can upgrade your robot arm more.

Achievements - reach those achievements baby, there are goals out there, and it's up to you to achieve the achievable and gain the achievements.

name: Little Trouble On Tribuda Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11 windows
  • Processor: quad core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11 windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 - 10700F CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1600 /AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Escape Confinement, who cares about your past sins, You have a robot arm!. Nothings going to stop you.
